conclusion: Identify the starting points of the liquid flow, which are A, B, and C.
Observe the direction of the liquid flow from each starting point. A flows to the right, B flows to the left, and C flows to the right.
Follow the path of the liquid flow from each starting point as it passes through the baffles. A flows through the green baffle, B flows through the red baffle, and C flows through the yellow baffle.
Determine the final destination of the liquid flow from each starting point. A flows into container F, B flows into container E, and C flows into container G.
Combine the final destinations of the liquid flow from each starting point. The liquid from A, B, and C will flow into containers E, F, and G.
Final answer: The liquid will flow into containers E, F, and G.
